details.text: Developed a creative Mario-inspired platformer game on Scratch. The game is filled with obstacle courses, challenges, and enemies to mimic the thrill and adventure of the original Mario games.

Produced an action-packed Scratch game emulating the 'bullet hell' genre, where players navigate through a barrage of lemon-shaped projectiles. The game promotes quick decision-making and hand-eye coordination, providing an intense gaming experience.

Crafted a rhythm game on Scratch that tests timing and reflexes. The game syncs movements with different music beats, offering a wide range of difficulty levels to provide a fun, challenging musical experience.

Developed a Python-based 'Algebra Helper' equipped with a user-friendly GUI. This tool assists students in understanding algebraic equations better by dynamically converting provided parameters into comprehensible mathematical expressions.
Created a Python-based Tic-Tac-Toe game utilizing the terminal as a GUI. It features a user-friendly interface and maintains the classic rules of the game.
Developed a Rock Paper Scissors game in Python that operates through the terminal. The game involves simple command-line interactions, providing an engaging and quick gaming experience.
Utilized Python's turtle module to create a festive drawing of a Christmas tree and house. This project displays my ability to use programming for creative and visual tasks.
Employed Python's turtle module to design a Chinese New Year greeting card, demonstrating the versatility of Python beyond traditional programming tasks.
